alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lee County through 545 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lochmoor Waterway Estates, or near Cape Coral. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Palmona Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, McGregor, Iona, East Dunbar, Suncoast Estates, North Fort Myers, Whiskey Creek and Tice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
